cleaned_text: 2021 Despite benefits of childhood vaccination, the COVID vaccines are still relatively new and lack long term safety data. That means mandating the vaccine for children would be premature, Georgetown law professor Lawrence Gostin and other experts wrote in a viewpoint piece for The Journal of the American Medical Association in June.
